title: Define project requirements and use cases
description: Identify the key functionalities and non-functional requirements of the VirtualizationOrchestrator platform.

title: Design the architecture for the platform
description: Develop a high-level design of the VirtualizationOrchestrator system, including its components and interactions.
dependencies: Define project requirements and use cases

title: Create a user interface design for the platform
description: Design the frontend user interface for managing and orchestrating virtualized resources across hybrid cloud environments.
dependencies: Define project requirements and use cases

title: Develop the backend services for the platform
description: Implement the necessary backend services to support the functionalities of the VirtualizationOrchestrator.
dependencies: Design the architecture for the platform

title: Implement database schema and models
description: Develop the necessary database schema and models to store and manage data related to virtualized resources.
dependencies: Design the architecture for the platform

title: Integrate DevOps practices and tools
description: Choose and configure appropriate DevOps tools for continuous integration, delivery, and deployment of the VirtualizationOrchestrator.
dependencies: Design the architecture for the platform

title: Write functional and unit tests
description: Create test cases for the VirtualizationOrchestrator platform to ensure its correct functioning.

title: Secure the VirtualizationOrchestrator platform
description: Perform security audits and implement necessary measures to protect the VirtualizationOrchestrator from potential threats.
